attributes.action: halt all pending extraditions of Asperger’s sufferers to USA for non-violent Summary Offences committed in the UK more than 6 months ago, where no evidence or exists for any other crime, and where the crime admitted was not extraditable at the time it was committed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No British citizen should be extradited under these conditions, yet it is happening under our very nose.  It is the duty of the Prime Minister to ensure that all British citizens should be protected from such injustice, and it is within his legally enshrined powers so to do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
